children.title: unit Nick Name
children.visible_expr: unitAccess = true

children.title: unit Access Reason
children.visible_expr: unitAccess = false

children.title: room Name
children.visible_expr: unitAccess = true

children.title: room Number
children.visible_expr: unitAccess = true

children.title: room Nick Name
children.visible_expr: unitAccess = true

children.title: room Access
children.visible_expr: unitAccess = true

children.title: room Access Reason
children.visible_expr: roomAccess = false
children.hint: Reason why you were not able to access this Room

children.title: risers
children.visible_expr: AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true)

children.title: risers Insulated
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),risers = true)

children.title: risers Photo
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),risers = true),risersInsulated = false)

children.title: radiator Number
children.visible_expr: AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true)

children.title: radiator Access
children.visible_expr: AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true)

children.title: radiator Access Reason
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorAccess = false)

children.title: radiator Nickname
children.visible_expr: AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true)

children.title: radiator Type
children.visible_expr: AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true)

children.title: piping System
children.visible_expr: AND(OR(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: wall Hinge Left Length
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: wall Hinge Right Length
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: wall Hinge Height
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: existing Cover
children.visible_expr: OR(AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron")

children.title: existing Cover Max Side
children.visible_expr: AND(OR(AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),existingCover = true)
children.hint: Left, Right, Left Front or Right Front. The side which has the most space between the radiator and the cover.

children.title: existing Cover Max Length
children.visible_expr: AND(OR(AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),existingCover = true)

children.title: maintenance Required
children.visible_expr: AND(OR(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: maintenance Required Spec
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(OR(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),maintenanceRequired = true),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: height Free Space
children.visible_expr: AND(OR(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: height FreeSpace Obstruction
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(OR(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),heightFreeSpace = false),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: height FreeSpace Measurement
children.visible_expr: AND(AND(OR(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),heightFreeSpace = false),radiatorAccess = true)

children.title: rightLowerPipe
children.visible_expr: AND(OR(AND(AND(AND(unitAccess = true,roomAccess = true),radiatorAccess = true),radiatorType = "Stand Alone Cast Iron"),radiatorType = "Wall Mounted Cast Iron"),rightHeight > 5)
children.hint: Is the pipe section adjacent to the radiator less than or equal to 5"
